channel.title: [317] Relentless - Economy - Great PvM and PvP
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BQuBHGY.gif[/img]
- Website: [URL=http://www.relentless317.com/forums/index.php]Website[/URL] - Download: [URL=http://www.relentless317.com/forums/showthread.php?t=12]Client Download[/URL] - Webclient: [URL=http://www.relentless317.com/forums/showthread.php?t=12]Website[/URL] - Store [URL=http://www.relentless317.com/forums/policy.php]Store[/URL] - Vote [URL=http://www.relentless317.com/vote/#?step=1]Vote[/URL]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Am0crBn.png[/img][/CENTER]
[LEFT]Relentless is a brand new server with the sole purpose to please our community’s members. This being said, we will listen to all of your ideas and requests and form the game upon those. Relentless RSPS offers a wide variety of choice and entertainment that provides a unique style of game-play for every single one of our players. We provide you with bug-free enjoyable content that intends to provide enjoyment to several types of players. The economy around Relentless is challengeable enough, which means you will need to work your way up for whatever you may desire. [/LEFT]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ma1SWXV.png[/img][/CENTER]
We are an economy server, which means every item ingame is obtained either by PKING/PVM and you will have to work for it. This way our items will have value, making it more exciting and fun for our players to have something to aim for instead of getting everything for free and not lifting a finger. There are different ways of exchanging your items, we are using specific market areas, clan chats and a dedicated section on forums for this.
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LPTw6Pe.png[/img][/CENTER]
All of Relentless’s staff are hand-picked based off applications and pre-work within the community, anyone is free to submit a staff application. These applications then get voted by all staff with the rank of Administrator and above, the few applicants providing us with the best applications will get a chance to prove themselves by starting off as a trial rank, Server Support. The staff managers will make sure we have staff covering all kind of time zones, but not only that, also having the best possible staff members available for you at all times.
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/k9lv1dD.png[/img][/CENTER]
Our development team are well aware of that all major updates have to come from what the community wants and desire. Once you have become a part of our community you will notice regular updates and polls that covers this, giving you the opportunity to bring what you want and enjoy into the game. We also have a suggestions section on forums, post your ideas there and believe us, your voice will be heard and perhaps even implemented if your fellow players supports you. We will always strive to make our community satisfied.
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oaN4QF7.png[/img][/CENTER]
[ul][*][B]FunPK:[/B] We have made this area for you to safely kill other players without losing your items, whenever you feel like pking without risking a dime, this is the minigame to go! You will have to purchase 500K gold to enter.
[*][B]Warrior’s Guild:[/B] The classic warrior’s guild involving animating armors, you kill these for their tokens. The tokens are then used for the top floor for to defeat the Cyclops for their defenders.
[*][B]Duel Arena:[/B] An arena made for the purpose to gamble others, we like to call it staking. You have different options of staking though, you can either choose to: Box, Mage-box, Range-box, DDS or Whip. Remember: Dueling is at your OWN risk!
[*][B]Castle Wars:[/B] The aim of Castle Wars is to take the enemy's standard, or flag, from their castle and return it to the standard in your own castle's keep, gaining 1 point each time. Players must prevent the opposing team from taking your standard by defending your castle. This can be done by killing, or simply using barricades and other equipments.
[*][B]Fight Caves/Fight Pits:[/B] Jad, one of the strongest and most fearful bosses Relentless has to offer. Players will be rewarded with Tokkul for playing this minigame, and if they manage to defeat TzTok-Jad, they will be rewarded with the fire cape - the 6th strongest cape in the game after Ardougne cape, Spirit cape, TokHaar-Kal, Max cape and the Completionist cape.
[*][B]Pest Control:[/B] Nothing like going out protecting the Void Knight collecting points to save up for Void Armor. Or perhaps you want to obtain a fighter torso, barrow gloves among other things. Fully functional pest control allows you to do just do that.[/ul]
[spoiler= Minigame Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AvFYGtW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aSehire.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6nwc0Vr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/f6nFeNx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xCRRVvR.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TtF9g0l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WyRwROU.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/znsWQtM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/A7zCbC3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hxAgyqa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XOhOdtH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4vYPtCZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0DLXvKk.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OAwSK6Q.png[/img][/CENTER]
[ul][*]King Black Dragon [*]Dagganoth Kings [*]Tormented Demons [*]Corporeal Beast [*]Strykeworms [*]Barrelchest [*]Kalphite Queen [*]Sea Troll Queen [*]Nomad [*]Revenants [*]Frost Dragons [*]Giant Sea Snake[/ul]
[spoiler= Bosses Media] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/9rk1du.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/1408wz.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/es4tvq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/148zm82.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/sm59qo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/214s1s9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/mvs2dk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/11t3ipd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/25qvq7m.jpg[/img] [/spoiler]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fEjcmPi.png[/img][/CENTER]
Here at Relentless we will always strive for optimal PKING activity. In order to accomplish that and maintain a high qualitative Wilderness for our players to enjoy, we have covered most of the areas with bosses/monsters where the drop rates will be slightly higher than other locations. Which means the chance of getting drops and making cash is bigger if you choose to PVM inside of the Wilderness, but at the same time it will be risky as players might attack you.
We have more or less made our Combat system to perfection and are always focusing on improving it. You will notice that Relentless Player Killing has a lot to offer and that it is both enjoyable and rewarding at the same time to participate in our PKING events, whether it be FFA (Free for All) or any other event whatever it could be. Hybrid, Melee and Pure Tournaments will be hosted now and then, for you to show the rest of our community who actually is the best of the best! We have made our XP rates high so you can train and PK in a short period of time.
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dKoEDGZ.png[/img][/CENTER]
[spoiler= Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yRAwRsk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EJOFYea.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2y8z8se.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BfGOB0C.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SnmRqqq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uyov2O3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OsuFRek.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/P4WMCIT.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SPr1dU9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0GGBTsh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GKjS2Nt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2Of4nr4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/d3RppSQ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gGHT4Mz.png[/img]
Can't add more images, only links:
[url=http://i.imgur.com/AByFGS9.png]http://i.imgur.com/AByFGS9.png[/url] [/spoiler]

item.title: [317] Relentless - Economy - Great PvM and PvP

your server has common packet exploit issues, in the screenshot provided I was thieving from dead monsters

I like the economy based approach. Shame it is a 317. Good luck.

item.source: [317] Relentless - Economy - Great PvM and PvP

item.title: [317] Relentless - Economy - Great PvM and PvP
item.dc:creator: @RLPK RLPK
item.description:
@RLPK wrote:

Thanks guys, we are working on an updated client/source with more features. Make sure to check it out!

Updates:

[ul][]Made beginner timer 45 mins to make sure people don’t cheat.
[]Re-done tutorial island, it’s easier and better now.
[]Removed the game modes, will add better modes later (sir, lord, legend) like SS.
[]Fixed clan chat, you can now give ranks out (you need to wait 60seconds or leave & rejoin clan chat)
[]Made it so it automatically moves you to “Help” clan chat, easier to talk. (Do
[]NOT flame/spam please)
[]When you are attacking a player in the wilderness it will give you random PKP (1-5) 1/25% chance.
[]Made it so when you wear an abby whip in the wilderness it will give you random bonusses (1%/2%/3%4%/5%/6%)
[]When you are in wilderness it will give a message “your special attack is now …%”
[]Fixed a few small bugs[/ul]

[B][U]Incoming PVP Updates:[/U][/B]

[ul][]Bounty hunter interface where you can see the following things:
– Target name
– Wilderness Level
– Target Percentage
[]Target System
[]Statuette’s System
[]More PVP Area’s
[*]EP System[/ul]

[B][U]Incoming PVM Updates:[/U][/B]

[ul][]More bosses for example: nex, nomad?
[]PVM points: everytime you kill a npc you will get one points and with points you can purchase items from shop.
[]More area’s for bosses
[]A boss that spawns every 30-60 mins in wildy with hotspot system.[/ul]

[B]Make sure to register on our forums/server[/B]

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Relentless - Economy - Great PvM and PvP

item.title: [317] Relentless - Economy - Great PvM and PvP
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

looks like a decent start just from logging in for a few moments couple of “first time playing notices”

  1. “learn you” is not proper English. I understand you may be from overseas so it’s understandable just thought you should know.
  2. For whatever reason the client when turning the character via the up/down/left/right arrow keys is very slow. I think this is client sided somewhere if this helps.

Besides that, good luck with the server just needs a player base and should be a decent one to come. I also like how you are charging to enter fun pk.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Relentless - Economy - Great PvM and PvP

item.title: [317] Relentless - Economy - Great PvM and PvP
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

Looks really nice,
Everything is really cool, i just don’t like the idea of the npcs clustered at home all together but overall it makes me wanna try it out.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Relentless - Economy - Great PvM and PvP

Our development team are well aware of that all major updates have to come from what the community wants and desire. [CENTER][/CENTER]

[ul][*][B]FunPK:[/B] We have made this area for you to safely kill other players without losing your items, whenever you feel like pking without risking a dime, this is the minigame to go! You will have to purchase 500K gold to enter.
